name: ContentFolder
description: Represents a folder in Salesforce CRM Content.
summary:
The `ContentFolder` object in Salesforce is used to organize and manage collections of content. It includes the following attributes:

- **Id (`id`)**: A unique identifier for the content folder.
- **IsDeleted (`boolean`)**: Indicates whether the folder has been deleted.
- **Name (`string`)**: The name of the content folder.
- **CreatedDate (`datetime`)**: The date and time when the folder was created.
- **CreatedById (`reference`)**: The ID of the user who created the folder.
- **LastModifiedDate (`datetime`)**: The date and time when the folder was last modified.
- **LastModifiedById (`reference`)**: The ID of the user who last modified the folder.
- **SystemModstamp (`datetime`)**: The date and time when the folder was last updated by the system.
- **ParentContentFolderId (`reference`)**: The ID of the parent content folder, if this folder is nested within another folder.

These attributes collectively help in managing the hierarchical structure, tracking creation and modification details, and ensuring the folder's integrity within the Salesforce content management system.
label: Content Folder
